question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: ¿En qué temporada ganó el Bursaspor el campeonato de la Süper Lig?
answer: El Bursaspor ganó el campeonato de la Süper Lig en la temporada 2009-2010.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Süper Lig championship in the 2009-2010 season.
